failed_criteria: Shelves appear generally tidy and orderly
action_plan: Reorganize shelves to prevent overcrowding: reduce the height of paper stacks, ensure files are aligned and not leaning, and avoid creating unstable piles.
visual_feedback: Mid and top shelves have tall, bulging piles of papers leaning forward and appearing unstable, risking falling.

failed_criteria: Multiple storage boxes on the floor instead of shelves
action_plan: Move documents from the floor boxes onto the shelving units or add additional shelving so that no more than two boxes of files are stored on the floor.
visual_feedback: Multiple file storage boxes are visible on the floor to the right of the shelving units, indicating documents are not properly shelved.
